item.title: Your nonprofit doesn't care about you (and that's good)
item.description: If you’ve made the decision to work at a nonprofit, it’s likely because you want your job to have more meaning than just a paycheck.

item.title: Please have better meetings
item.description: Did you know that meetings don’t have to be the worst part of your job?
